task_text: [Vaccinology][Summarization] Summarize the WHO vaccine-market analysis on production capacity and global-supply bottlenecks.

gold_end_state.answer: The WHO market analysis identifies limited manufacturing surge capacity, raw-material and fill-finish bottlenecks, and inequitable purchase power as key constraints; it recommends transparency in contracts, diversified production, and global coordination to improve allocation fairness.

arguments.query: WHO COVID-19 vaccine market analysis production capacity and global supply bottlenecks
